mapper.insert: insert into sjb_order(memberId, orderRec, memberAddr1, memberAddr2, memberAddr3, orderPhone, orderDate, shipPrice, totalPrice, orderState) values(#{memberId}, #{orderRec}, #{memberAddr1}, #{memberAddr2}, #{memberAddr3}, #{orderPhone}, sysdate(), #{shipPrice}, #{totalPrice}, 0);
insert into sjb_order_detail(orderId, productId, amount) values(#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{amount});
